section.p: To modify values of existing parameter set choose the name of parameter set in the Property Set combo-box. Then in the XSLT Parameters table chose the parameter you want to modify, and click Edit or double-click the parameter. You will be able to edit the element in the Edit XSLT Parameter Dialog.

note.p: You cannot edit the values of Default View parameter set. This is the set of the parameters that are provided by the stylesheet itself. You can roll back to the Default View any time.
